title: Wellness Tracker
description: A fitness tracking database application that helps users monitor and improve their fitness and health by tracking various metrics and providing insights.

title: LinkedIn Job Market Analysis
description: Analyzing LinkedIn job postings to uncover job market trends and insights using cloud-based data processing and visualization tools.

title: OutfitAI
description: A multimodal GenAI application analyzing clothing images to recommend similar items and purchase locations.

title: Cross-modal MRI Registration using U-Net based Models
description: Enhancing cross-modal MRI image registration using advanced U-Net based deep learning models for improved medical imaging.

title: Walmart Sales Forecasting
description: Predicting future sales for Walmart using various time series and machine learning models to optimize inventory and workforce management.

title: Pichu Search and Placement
description: A project involving the parsing of a map, searching for a path within a matrix, and placing elements while avoiding revisited nodes.

title: Bird Sorting with A* search
description: Implementing A* search with heuristic functions to efficiently solve sorting and complex puzzle problems, optimizing the solution path.

title: Text Classifier
description: Implementing a strategy for a board game involving Pichu, Pikachu, and Raichu using heuristic-based search algorithms to determine the best moves and capture all opponent pieces and a Naive Bayes classifier to categorize hotel reviews into fake or legitimate using text preprocessing and probabilistic modeling for improved accuracy.

title: Parts of Speech Tagging
description: Implementing parts of speech tagging using multiple approaches such as Simplified Bayes Net, Viterbi-HMM and Markov Chain Monte Carlo - Gibbs Sampling

title: KNN and MLP implementation from scratch
description: Implementing classification algorithms to predict data classes using two different approaches i.e, KNN(K-Nearest Neighbors Classification) and MLP (Multilayer Perceptron Classification)
